Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.copy

This package contains implementation classes used when executing the Copy operations in an assign activity.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeCopyWholeMessageStrategy Copies the whole message variable from one variable to another.
AeEmptySelectionStrategy Selecting a null value in a typically results in a bpel:selectionFailure.
AeErrorStrategy Strategy that throws an error since something unexpected has happened in the strategy lookup (e.g.
AeMismatchedAssignmentStrategy Strategy that throws an error since the copy operation has detected a mismatched assignment
AeReplaceContentElementStrategy Specialized version of ReplaceContent strategy that involves copying a text type to an element.
AeReplaceContentStrategy Handles copying the content of an Element, Attribute, Text, or String into a CII container like an Attribute, Text, or Message Part
AeReplaceElementStrategy Handles copying one element to another.
AeSelectionFailureStrategy This strategy is used whenever a bpel:selectionFailure is guaranteed, such as when multiple nodes are selected.
AeSetPartnerLinkStrategy Copies a service-ref element into a partnerLink's partnerRole
AeSrefToEprReplaceElementStrategy Handles copying the source's first child element to the target (e.g. service-ref element to wsa:epr element).
AeStaticAnalysisFailureStrategy This strategy should never be executed.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.copy Description

This package contains implementation classes used when executing the Copy operations in an assign activity.
